R

randFirstState() - Static method in class NationMania.core.Nations
Called once every game in the first round, since this is the only time the next nation is not already set.
Randomizes a nation from the list, and get it's facts list from the DB.
randNation() - Static method in class NationMania.core.Nations
Called at the start of every round.
In the first round, it randomizes once for the current round, and again on a different thread for the next round
In every other round, it sets the nation that was randomized in the previous round as the current nation, and randomizes
again for the next round.
randNextState() - Static method in class NationMania.core.Nations
This function is identical to "randFirstState", except for the fact it saves the nation the was randomized in the
"game next fact" parameter.
This function is preformed by a different thread, to not disturb the flow of the game.
reducePoints(int) - Static method in class NationMania.core.Round
Called after player requests a new fact or continent, and reduces the number of points left for this round.
If the player requests a fact - the penalty is 2 points more than the last fact.
If the player requests a continent - the penalty is set to quater of the remaining round points.
relation - Variable in class NationMania.parsing.YagoEntry
 
REPORT - Static variable in class NationMania.ui.GameFonts
 
reportFact(int) - Static method in class NationMania.core.Round
Called after player makes a valid report - update fact on DB that has been reported.
If fact was reported more than a certain threshold, it will not be displayed anymore.
This action not valid for continent facts.
reset() - Static method in class NationMania.core.Round
Called every new round.
Resets the round parameters to their initial values
Round - Class in NationMania.core
Class containing all data for current round (one round = one state)
The data is only valid for the current game with the current player
Round() - Constructor for class NationMania.core.Round
 
runScript(Reader) - Method in class NationMania.db.YagoSQLScript
Runs an SQL script (read in using the Reader parameter)
